execution_quality: The agent successfully implemented the core configuration system and format selection, but the work summary output format parameter was not properly integrated into the execution path, leaving one part of the requested functionality non-functional.
work_category: Feature implementation for config file enhancement and output format support, adding org-mode as an alternative to markdown for work summaries.
summary: The agent independently implemented both requested features (config parameter flexibility and org-mode format support) and made 11 edits across multiple files, but failed to properly wire the format parameter into the work summary generation logic. While the agent recovered from several errors during implementation, the core user intent—having org-mode format affect the work summary—was not achieved, requiring follow-up debugging despite the agent marking the task complete.
follow_up_pattern: User expects debugging/troubleshooting to identify why the org-mode format setting isn't being applied to work summaries, likely requiring investigation of how the format parameter flows through the codebase.
